Observed at: King City North 11:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:16 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:16 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:16 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
